attributes.action: give the remainder of his public speeches in the style of Papa Lazarou, including face paint and three legged dog.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: speeches to include the PM talking about his views on pegs, wives and to address everyone as "Dave".  When Gordon Brown takes over at No. 10, the batton must be handed over and he is to deliver similar speeches at least twice a month.  This will enable the rest of the world to realise that, despite everything, the UK has not lost it's sense of humour.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
